DOC.brief_summary: This open label , single-center study determine whether certain nasal medication interact PMI-150 ( intranasal ketamine ) 30 mg healthy adult volunteer patient allergic rhinitis .
DOC.brief_title: Determination Drug Interactions Certain Nasal Medications With Intranasal Ketamine
DOC.detailed_description: To assess separately effect nasal vasoconstrictor ( oxymetazoline ) nasal steroid rate extent intranasal absorption PMI-150 30 mg .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult Patients Allergic Rhinitis Under age 18
